form.name: Name
form.desc_info: Please provide a very clear description of what the project is for, what it does, or what problem it solves.
form.built_info: Is this project something for Cardano OR something built on Cardano? An example of something that's for Cardano is a wallet or a developer library. An example of something built on Cardano is Traxia.
form.new_data: wants to propose the following new data:
form.ins_desc: Projects added here must be something that people can use with Cardano, for example a wallet, a developer library, a development framework, etc.

main.desc: Projects that are built on or for Cardano. This includes everything from developer libraries to user wallets.

view.no_gh: GitHub repo is not available. If you know this information, please contribute below:
view.no_web: Website is not available. If you know this information, please contribute below:
view.missing_info: This project does't contain any link to the source repository

card.are_you_sure: Are you sure you want to remove this Project? This action is not reversible.
